layout.textChannelUnsupported: Text channels are currently not supported.
layout.stageAreaDescription: Select a channel on the left.

identity.title: Your Clover identity
identity.body: Your identity stays local on your device. You can export (backup) or import it at any time. Without an identity you can't join a server.

servers.title: Create or join servers
servers.body: Use the green + on the left to create servers or join servers—including from other instances. Remote servers are pinned automatically.

voice.title: Voice calls
voice.body: Click a voice channel to connect. Below the call you'll see who's in the talk—and who's currently speaking.

settings.title: Server settings & roles
settings.body: As an admin you can create channels, assign roles, and set permissions per channel. Open server settings via the gear next to the server name.
